verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm forgiven,
Because You were forsaken.
I'm accepted.
You were condemned.
I'm alive and well,
Your Spirit is within me.
Because You died and rose again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Amazing love,
How can it be?
That You my king should die for me?
Amazing love,
I know it's true.
And it's my joy to honor You.
In all I do,
I honor You.
